comment.author: 31608675@N00
comment._content: That would be Shawmut Ave, not "Shawmul". It looks to be taken near the intersect with Ruggles Street, based on the angle with the Hancock Tower.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Paul-W:

Thanks for spotting title typo! We've made the change to Shawmut.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
